skills.skill: Excellent written and oral communication skills

duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in all aspects of volunteer management, including outreach, coordination, and events.
Assist with onboarding new volunteers and interns by creating files and updating contact information.
Help with volunteer engagement/recommitment initiatives including newsletters and annual renewal agreement.
Assist in meeting, trainings, and event preparations.
Assist with solicitation of in-kind donations.
Answer phones and provide excellent customer service.

education_certification.credential: Current undergraduate or graduate student (over the age of 18)
Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (preferred)
